page.title: 04FAIR
page.content: In the morning some fourth years helped parents prepare the things for the afternoon's event.It was touch and go as it rained twice before the fair was scheduled to start.At 2.00pm the gates opened and Mr Wicks our class teacher gave us at least Â£2.00 float each as we needed it for the games we were running.The games were a buzzer,how many marbles in a jar, pony rides,find the egg,tin cans, shoot through the hole and other things. There were lots of people milling around,playing on the games and buying from the stalls.We had white Elephant,Morris Dancing,Nearly New, Raffle,Lucky D ip,plants,refreshments, toys,face painting,hair spraying, disco bouncey which you bounced around to records in.We raised about Â£900. We are spending it on a stereo and play equipment for the infants.
